name: Roblox Developer Community
description:
This is the official group for Roblox Developers! All members of the community are invited to join. The goal of this group is to foster teamwork and creativity while providing updates on events going on in the Developer Community.

Join the Developer Forum here: https://devforum.roblox.com/

Get notifications about our Game Jams and Challenges on the Forum here: https://devforum.roblox.com/g/Game-Jammers

Member of an international community? You can find international groups below:
Spanish: https://www.roblox.com/groups/7839291/Desarrolladores-de-Roblox#!/about
Portuguese: https://www.roblox.com/groups/4806497/Roblox-em-Portugu-s#!/about

name: Piggy Official Fan Club
description:
‚ö†Ô∏è[Official Fan Club & Group ‚úîÔ∏è]‚ö†Ô∏è

Made for the fans of Piggy, a successful horror game in Roblox! 
What's this game about? ü§î

 In Roblox Piggy, you are a police officer investigating the disappearance of George Piggy.

As it's also multiplayer you're either with other players and/or your friends! When you arrive on the scene, you get knocked out by a mysterious Pig... 

Weird right? 
Suddenly you wake up in a bedroom you have never seen before. 
You must escape the place by finding tools around the area. It's like a puzzle game, but of course, while you are being chased by that strange Pig looking creature (aka Piggy) which attempt is on getting you kiIIed. 

Will you be able to make it through this long adventure? 
Many creatures await for your arrival... 

üëïMerchandiseüëï Check our group store for Piggy merch! üê∑

name: Temple of Brickbattle
description:
Welcome to the Temple of Brickbattle.

Brick battle, made by Shedletsky, is the oldest ROBLOX combat genre, beginning in 2006. This group is dedicated to it along with its games.

In the ranks, [S] signifies 'special.' They do not have more powers than the regular numbered ranks. [O] signifies 'overseer,' and they do have powers.

GROUP RULES (updated March 28th, 2019):
- To be ranked, be on the lookout for ranking sessions in the group shout every now and then. While rankings are up to the discretion of Ranktesters and the Rankmaster, they do follow a skill level from [1] to [7].
- You may only post links to the group wall if it is a brick battle asset. 
- Do not ask for R$ on the group wall. 
- Do not spam on the group wall. 
- Do not impersonate other users.

Penalties for rule violations are a warning, a demotion back to the Follower rank, or a kick from the group depending on the severity of the violation. We reserve the right to exercise these penalties for any reason.
